articles.author: Joseph Ataman, Saskya Vandoorne, Serene Nourrisson, Christian Edwards
articles.title: Far-right leader Marine Le Pen banned from 2027 presidential race, throwing French politics into disarray - CNN
articles.description: Far-right figurehead Marine Le Pen has been banned from running for political office for five years after being found guilty of embezzling European Union funds, in a politically explosive ruling that has shattered her hopes of winning France’s 2027 presidenti…
articles.content: French far-right figurehead Marine Le Pen has been banned from running for political office for five years after being found guilty of embezzling European Union funds, in a politically explosive ruli… [+4645 chars]

articles.title: European Gaia mapping satellite is retired but proves very tough to kill - The Register
articles.description: : I'm sorry Dave, I can't do that
articles.content: The last commands have been sent to the ESA's Gaia satellite and, after a dozen years scanning the galaxy, the spacecraft is shutting down its computers and boosting out into a retirement orbit aroun… [+4126 chars]
